title: Application Support Engineer (Capital Market)
jobDescription:
Key Responsibilities


Application Support: Provide first and second-level support for capital markets applications, resolving issues promptly and ensuring minimal downtime.

Incident Management: Handle incident tickets, troubleshoot issues, and escalate to relevant teams when necessary.

User Support: Assist end-users with application-related queries and provide training on application functionalities.

System Monitoring: Monitor application performance, identify potential issues, and implement solutions to enhance system stability.

Root Cause Analysis: Conduct root cause analysis of recurring issues and recommend process improvements.

Collaboration: Work closely with development teams, business analysts, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless application performance and user satisfaction.

Documentation: Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation of application issues, resolutions, and procedures.

Compliance: Ensure compliance with industry regulations and company policies.



Qualifications


Education: Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Finance, or a related field.

Experience: 2-4 years of experience in application support within the capital markets sector.

Technical Skills: Proficiency in SQL, Unix/Linux, and scripting languages. Experience with application monitoring tools and incident management systems.

Capital Markets Knowledge: Strong understanding of capital markets, trading platforms, financial instruments, and market regulations.

Problem-Solving: Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to think critically and troubleshoot complex issues.

Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to interact effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Team Player: Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and manage multiple priorities.


Preferred Qualifications

Certifications: Relevant certifications in capital markets, ITIL, or application support.

Experience with Financial Systems: Prior experience with financial systems and applications used in capital markets.

Project Management: Basic knowledge of project management principles and practices.

title: Wordpress Web Developer
jobDescription:
WordPress Web Developer


All our websites are build using OXYGEN BUILDER. So 3 years of experience is MUST.


Key Responsibilities

  1. Website Development & Customization:
    • Design, develop, and maintain responsive WordPress websites using custom themes, plugins, and coding.
    • Customize WordPress themes and plugins to meet specific project requirements and client specifications.
    • Ensure websites are visually appealing, user-friendly, and functionally robust across all devices and browsers.
  2. Plugin & Theme Management:
    • Install, configure, and manage WordPress plugins and themes, ensuring compatibility and performance optimization.
    • Develop custom plugins or modify existing ones to add new features and functionalities as needed.
    • Keep themes and plugins updated and secure by applying the latest updates and patches.
  3. Front-End & Back-End Development:
    • Implement front-end elements using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other relevant technologies to enhance website aesthetics and functionality.
    • Manage back-end elements, including database integration, server configuration, and security measures.
    • Develop and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code to support website functionality.
  4. Website Optimization & Performance:
    • Optimize website speed and performance by minimizing load times, reducing file sizes, and optimizing images.
    • Implement best practices for SEO to improve website visibility and ranking in search engine results.
    • Conduct regular website audits to identify and fix issues related to performance, security, and user experience.
  5. Security & Compliance:
    • Implement security measures to protect websites from potential threats, including malware, hacking, and data breaches.
    • Set up and manage website backups, ensuring data integrity and availability in case of emergencies.
    • Ensure websites comply with relevant legal and industry regulations, such as GDPR and ADA.
  6. Client Interaction & Project Management:
    • Communicate with clients to gather requirements, provide updates, and deliver solutions that meet their needs and expectations.
    • Collaborate with project managers, designers, and content creators to ensure a cohesive and seamless website development process.
    • Manage project timelines and deliverables, ensuring that all projects are completed on time and within budget.
  7. Troubleshooting & Support:
    • Diagnose and resolve technical issues related to WordPress websites, including plugin conflicts, server errors, and performance problems.
    • Provide ongoing website maintenance and support, addressing client queries and making necessary updates.
    • Offer technical support and training to clients, helping them manage and update their WordPress sites.
  8. Continuous Improvement & Innovation:
    • Stay updated with the latest WordPress developments, trends, and best practices to enhance website development skills.
    • Experiment with new technologies and methodologies to improve website performance, security, and user experience.
    • Participate in professional development opportunities, such as workshops, webinars, and conferences, to stay current in the field.
  9. Quality Assurance & Testing:
    • Conduct thorough testing of websites, including functionality, usability, and responsiveness, before deployment.
    • Identify and fix bugs and issues, ensuring a smooth and error-free user experience.
    • Implement quality assurance processes to maintain high standards in website development and delivery.
  10. Documentation & Knowledge Sharing:
    • Document development processes, customizations, and code changes for future reference and team knowledge sharing.
    • Create user manuals and guides for clients, assisting them in managing and updating their websites.
    • Share knowledge and insights with team members, contributing to a collaborative and innovative work environment.

title: Web Developer
jobDescription:
• Website and software application designing, building, or maintaining.
  • Using scripting or authoring languages, management tools, content creation tools, applications, and digital media.
  • Conferring with teams to resolve conflicts, prioritize needs, develop content criteria, or choose solutions.
  • Directing or performing Website updates.
  • Developing or validating test routines and schedules to ensure that test cases mimic external interfaces and address all browser and device types.
  • Editing, writing, or designing Website content, and directing team members who produce content.
  • Maintaining an understanding of the latest Web applications and programming practices through education, study, and participation in conferences, workshops, and groups.
  • Back up files from Web sites to local directories for recovery.
  • Identifying problems uncovered by customer feedback and testing, and correcting or referring problems to appropriate personnel for correction.
  • Evaluating code to ensure it meets industry standards, is valid, is properly structured, and is compatible with browsers, devices, or operating systems.
  • Determining user needs by analyzing technical requirements.

Requirements:

  • Bachelors degree in Web development or related field, or relevant experience.
  • Solid knowledge and experience in programming applications.
  • Proficient in PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS.
  • Proficient in My SQL.
  • Dedicated team player.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.
  • Solid ability in both written and verbal communication.
  • Knowledge of programming language and technical terminology.
  • Able to develop ideas and processes and clearly express them.
  • High degree of independent judgment.
  • Able to solve complex problems.
Regular / Permanent Education:
  • Bachelors (Preferred)
Experience:
  • HTML5, CSS, JavaScript and My SQL: 2 years (Preferred)
  • total work: 2 years (Preferred)
